module.name: parameter_value_specification
module.name.french: spécification de la valeur de paramètre

change.description: Normative reference to ISO 13584-20 was causing red-line text, now fixed.

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of parameter value specifications. Parameter value specifications may be linked to any type of parameter by using application modules.

inscope.li: a parameter value specified as an expression;
a parameter value specified as a value with units;
a parameter value specified as an instance of an entity type.

outscope.li: parameter values other than represented as expression, value wit unit or entity instances.
